data.title: Ice Cream
data.text: Great place to stop for ice cream after an event or just to take the grandkids. Reasonable prices. Indoor and outdoor seating..

data.title: Yummy
data.text: The ice cream is always very tasty, no crystals.  The staff I have encountered is always pleasant and friendly.

data.title: Movie & an Ice Cream - March 2016
data.text: I love the ice cream here. Lots of add on toppings too. I usually stop here after seeing a movie. On this visit, there was no one in the facility so I was immediately helped. I've read other reviews that mention the workers not being attentive...that wasn't the case of me and hope it never is. I wasn't sure about a couple of the flavors and the worker offered me taste samples. I ended up going with the dark chocolate ice cream with Reese's added. Pretty good! Now the price is a completely different story here (applies to all CSCs). I think the price is a bit high for the amount of ice cream you get. I would rate them 4 stars if the prices were about 10-15% less. I guess we're paying for convenience. As long as the price doesn't continue to slowly increase, I'll be back.

data.title: Birthday treat
data.text: For a treat on a birthday we went to cold stone creamery, I must say even though the neighborhood is less that desirable  we went anyhow. The service was cheerful and quick we ate their at one of there tables that were clean, then we took in a movie.

data.title: Great Ice Cream!
data.text: We went to Cold Stone Creamery after a movie in the same complex.  The wait person was friendly and helpful in answering all our questions and comments.  She was the only person working there at the time.  We were the only people in the store but more came in after us.  My husband and I ordered the strawberry funnel cake with vanilla ice cream , my son had a brownie sundae and my grandson had 2 big scoops of different flavored ice cream.  The only complaint my husband and I had about the food was the strawberries were frozen whole and were quite tart in comparison to the sweetness of the ice cream. We are in the middle of Strawberry Season and they are grown locally so not sure why our area berries which are red, sweet, fresh and cheap, could not have been used.  The frozen ones were also quite hard so they were left on the plate. The only other thing I can call out was the floors were very dirty.  There were broken cones on the floor that had been stepped on and broken cones under our table and the table was not wiped down so we had to wipe them ourselves.  I need you to keep in mind that the wait person was in there alone and it was after a show let out so she was probably busy.  She was great to deal with and what is better than an ice cream after a movie?

data.title: Yummy tummy time!! 😋
data.text: It was my husbands first time here we went for my birthday. I love there ice cream but this time we went the tables and chairs were dirty the staff was a little to busy talking to each other. But at least my ice cream was good.

data.title: Good, but needs to get better............
data.text: I have gone to this location every year for the past few years when I visited Stockton on business.  The ice cream has always been great, but the cleanliness has not.  I have noticed a decline in this area for each of the past 3 years.  I know that it can be difficult to keep a business like this spotless, but the situation seems out of control now.  I sure hope they can stop the decline before it costs them more than just my business.

data.title: Conos muy grandes
data.text: Se nota que la calidad es artesanal. Lo recomiendo 100% son excelentes y muy abundantes, se puede compartir.
